item.title: 中国央行称经济发展势头良好但挑战依然存在
item.description: 中国央行表示，中国经济正呈现积极迹象，信心正在建立，但内需不足和通货紧缩压力等挑战依然存在。【原文：China’s economy is showing positive signs and confidence is building, but challenges such as insufficient domestic demand and deflationary pressure persist, according to the country’s central bank.】

item.description: 全球寿险公司正面临着竞争压力，即使债务风险有上升迹象，它们也要继续增加对私人信贷的配置，以获得更高的利润。【原文：Global life insurance companies are facing competitive pressure to keep boosting their allocations to private credit to generate higher profit, even as risk in the debt shows signs of rising.】

item.description: Blackrock Inc. 投资与投资组合解决方案全球主管 Alex Brazier 表示，尽管欧洲投资者可能会从美国带回现金，但由于德国雄心勃勃的财政扩张，德国政府债券看起来缺乏吸引力。【原文：German government bonds look unattractive due to the country’s ambitious fiscal expansion, despite potential appetite from European investors bringing cash home from the US, said Alex Brazier, Blackrock Inc.’s global head of investments and portfolio solutions.】

item.title: 长期抗击通胀后，智利央行决策者看到了好兆头
item.description: 智利央行董事会成员路易斯-费利佩-塞斯佩德斯（Luis Felipe Cespedes）在接受采访时表示，智利央行认为一系列因素的共同作用将有助于使通胀率在2026年初回到目标值。【原文：Chile’s central bank sees a set of factors coming together that will help bring inflation back down to target early in 2026, board member Luis Felipe Cespedes said in an interview.】

item.title: 中国 500 亿美元芯片基金转向对抗美国限制
item.description: 中国主要的芯片投资基金正计划重点关注中国在光刻技术和半导体设计软件等领域的关键短板，调整方法以更好地克服美国阻止其技术进步的努力。【原文：China’s main chip investment fund is planning to focus on the country’s key shortcomings in sectors like lithography and semiconductor design software, adjusting its approach to better overcome US efforts to stop its technological advances.】

item.title: 波罗的海燃油价格下跌导致俄罗斯燃油流量降至 8 个月来最低水平
item.description: 由于供应波罗的海港口的炼油厂延长了工作时间，加上在即将到来的农业和假日消费季节性激增之前努力稳定国内燃料供应，俄罗斯的石油产品出口量在 6 月份降至 8 个月以来的最低点。【原文：Russia’s oil product exports dropped in June to the lowest in eight months amid extended work at refineries supplying Baltic ports, coupled with efforts to stabilize domestic fuel supplies before the upcoming seasonal surge in agricultural and holiday consumption.】

item.title: 热浪威胁欧洲农作物和电力系统

item.title: 苹果和谷歌被告知中国 DeepSeek 应用在德国是非法的
item.description: 苹果公司和谷歌的安卓系统被德国一家顶级隐私监管机构警告称，在其应用商店中提供的中国人工智能服务 DeepSeek 构成非法内容，因为它会将用户数据暴露给中国当局。【原文：Apple Inc. and Google’s Android have been warned by a top German privacy regulator that the Chinese AI service DeepSeek, available on their app stores, constitutes illegal content because it exposes users’ data to Chinese authorities.】

item.title: 印度米仓已满，稻米产量将再创新高
item.description: 印度的大米储量达到了至少二十年来的最高水平，这增加了印度在大米收成即将再创新高的情况下没有地方储存大米的风险。【原文：India’s stash of rice is running at the highest for this time in at least two decades, raising the risk it will run out of room to store it all as another record crop looms.】
